archimate:Requirement.name: TS.2.2.7b: b) establishing a cryptographic key escrow scheme (i.e. where copies of cryptographic keys are held by an authorised external party such as a legal representative, lawyer or equivalent)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
